Outcome: Find a job in ML evidence synthesis
Description: I’m looking for a job where I can transition from a freelance researcher to a ML team member drawing on his hands-on experience with academic evidence synthesis within health sciences. I need work visa sponsorship.

Outcome: Supervise development of national clinical practice guidelines
Description: Supervised methodology and coordinated development of the National Clinical Guideline program in orthopedics and traumatology. Helped produce and/or coauthored a total of 25 clinical practice guidelines.

Outcome: Collaborate on a publication with an international team
Description: Participated in the first published ‘2-week’ scoping review project – published: Meloncelli et al., 2022.
